hero.title: GS ADVOGADOS
hero.lead: We lead advocacy in financial and business industries.

empresarial.title: CORPORATE & CONTRACTS
empresarial.desc: Company formation, contract review/negotiation and governance. We support from kickoff to scale, reducing risk and accelerating decisions.

contencioso.title: LITIGATION & ARBITRATION
contencioso.desc: Procedural planning, interim measures and enforcement. Civil and commercial disputes and national arbitrations, with fast, effective outcomes.

laboral.title: EMPLOYMENT & IMMIGRATION
laboral.desc: Internal policies, contracts, disciplinary matters and termination. Visas and expatriate mobility, ensuring compliance with Angolan labor law.

about.title: About Us
about.lead: GS ADVOGADOS is the first law firm established in Angola, structured to deliver fast and effective responses to our clients’ legal needs.

publico.title: PUBLIC & ADMINISTRATIVE
publico.desc: Advisory and disputes involving the State, administrative acts and partnerships with the public sector.

civil.title: CIVIL, COMMERCIAL & CONSUMER
civil.desc: Representation in disputes between individuals and companies, consumer relations and debt collection.

energiaRecursos.title: ENERGY & NATURAL RESOURCES
energiaRecursos.desc: Regulatory and contractual advice for extractive industries and public utility sectors.

familia.title: FAMILY & SUCCESSION
familia.desc: Family planning and resolution of personal and property disputes.

saude.title: HEALTH & MEDICAL LIABILITY
saude.desc: Medical malpractice matters and civil/criminal liability in the healthcare context.

laboralSegSocial.title: EMPLOYMENT & SOCIAL SECURITY
laboralSegSocial.desc: Representation in labour disputes and social security matters.
